Product.ProductName: Livon Hair Gain Tonic
Product.ProductDescription:
It has Active Energizers and is a tried and tested product, trusted by Indians who are looking for hair fall treatment.

Livon Hair Gain Works In 2 Ways:

Stops Hair Fall- DHT - the hormone is believed to shorten the Anagen (growth) phase of the hair cycle causing continued shrinking (miniaturization) of the hair follicle, which produces progressively finer hair. With Livon Hair Gain the Anagen (growth phase) to Telogen (rest phase) ratio is normalized which prevents follicle shrinkage and hence hair fall is controlled.

Promotes Hair Growth- Hair Gain limits the main causes of hair fall such as poor blood circulation, aging and shrinkage of hair collicles. Thereby enhancing blood circulation and re-energizing the follicle, which boosts healthy hair growth.

3-Step Action : Science Behind Livon Hair Gain

Livon Hair Gain Tonic with active Root Energisers is a breakthrough formula that accelerates hair growth. This unique formulation is enriched with hair re-growth molecules developed after intensive research on different Indian hair types. Overall, this wonderful formulation enhances the Anagen (growth) phase of hair which normalizes the hair growth cycle and enhances the quality of hair thus improving the Anagen (growth) / Telogen (rest) phase ratio by 25% in 90 days.

Step 1 - Penetrates to the root of the hair follicle and clears up the debris around it which helps in restoring proper blood flow to the follicle.

Step 2 - Restores proper circulation of blood and nutrients to the hair follicle hence provides nourishment to the follicle for healthy growth.

Step 3 - It prevents shrinking of hair follicles and helps it grow in a healthy cycle. During hair loss, terminal hair (thick) starts becoming finer. Livon Hair Gain stops the thinning of hair to lessen hair fall.

Product.ProductName: Gillette Fusion Men'S Power Razor
Product.ProductDescription:
The Gillette Fusion Power Razor features Gillette's advanced shaving performance, even on sensitive skin. The battery-powered Gillette Fusion Power razor adds to the features of the Gillette Fusion Manual razor with PowerGlide blades and soothing Micropulses that allow the shaver to gently glide across your face with less friction and less shaving irritation. An on-board Microchip regulates the power to ensure consistency shave after shave. It's a great razor for sensitive skin.

Key Features :

  • Battery-Powered Shaving System, soothing micropulses with incredible comfort. You’ll barely feel the blades.
  • 5 Blade Shaving Surface Technology has 5 PowerGlide blades spaced closer together to help reduce pressure - with less irritation and more comfort than MACH3
  • Low Battery Indicator Light. Enhanced Indicator Lubricating Strip BV9
  • 1 Precision Trimmer Blade allows you to easily trim sideburns, shave under the nose, shape facial

Battery Warning Statement :

  • Remove battery when vibration slows or ceases. Do not leave depleted battery in device. Replace batteries only in a dry environment
  • Dispose of batteries in accordance with local regulations.

Caution :

  • Insert AAA Alkaline battery, e.g. Duracell, correctly and do not short circuit.
  • If a battery leaks, wipe device clean with a damp cloth and wash hands. If any material gets into the eyes, contact a doctor immediately.
  • Keep away from children. Do not swallow. If swallowed, seek medical advice at once.

Micropulse Power : Soothing battery-powered Micropulses of the Gillette Fusion Power razor help reduce friction and increase razor glide so you barely feel the blades.

Pure Performance : Features blades spaced closer together than MACH3 to help reduce pressure. State-of-the-art Gillette Fusion Power razor blade technology delivers a close, more comfortable shave compared to Gillette MACH3 razors. And a better shave means better looking, better feeling skin.

Precision Comfort : A flexible Comfort Guard with 15 Microfins helps deliver an extremely close, comfortable shave by gently stretching the skin, while an integral Precision Trimmer is a perfect tool for shaving those tricky spots, like under your nose, and around facial hair and sideburns.

  • It has a pop-up trimmer which can be used to trim moustache and sideburns.
  • You can shave beard with cream or foam and you can also opt for dry shave.

Aquatec Wet & Dry : The Aquatec seal on the shaver makes it 100% waterproof. Use it in the shower with your favorite shaving gel or foam for extra skin protection. Naturally, you can also shave dry for convenience. When you're done, simply pop the heads open and rinse under the tap to easily clean your shaver.

DualPrecision Effectively : DualPrecision blades comfortably shave both long hairs and short stubble. Slots cut long hairs. Holes cut stubble

50 Shaving Minutes, 1 Hour Charge : An energy-efficient, powerful lithium-ion battery gives you more shaves per charge. Charge it for an hour, and you'll have up to 50 minutes of shaving time - that's around 17 shaves. Charge it for 3 minutes and you'll have enough power for one shave.

Washable shaver with Quick Rinse System : With Quick Rinse system to clean under the tap and can be used under the shower.

Glides Smoothly Over the Curves of your Face : Rounded low-friction protection heads adjust to the curves of your face to limit skin damage.

Super Lift & Cut Blades Raise Hairs to Cut Closer : The first blade raises each hair while the second blade comfortably cuts below skin level, for really smooth results.

Perfect for Trimming your Sideburns and Moustache : Complete your look by using the pop up trimmer. Perfect for maintaining a moustache and trimming sideburns.

3 Minute Quick Charge for One Shave : 3 minute quick charge provides enough power for one shave, so that you are always fast even when the battery is empty.

Additional Information : Philips is a Dutch consumer electronics company that has wide range of products in Healthcare, Lighting and Consumer Lifestyle. Philips Aqua Touch Shaver AT891/16 is a very useful product for men.

Product.ProductName: Police To Be The Illusionist Eau De Toilette Vapo
Product.ProductDescription:
The new perfume The Illusionist is based on the original concept of the To Be line by Police and expands it to its maximum degree: the themes of darkness and mystery, represented by the iconic symbol of the Skull, are re-interpreted in a register of magic. These re-interpretations, along with the innovative technique used to develop the bottle, generate a perfume that overall embraces the concept of illusion. The Illusionist is a person who has the ability to create around himself a mysterious and almost magical atmosphere, one that is capable of surprise. The array of optical illusions and reflections embodied in the bottle adorn it with an impenetrable and evocative aura, and perfectly express the strength and the complexity that the Skull represents.

The track of a pure sharp fragrance for men, built around a modern fresh fougere signature conferring self-confidence and a rugged masculine strength. The composition opens on incisive top notes based on a transparent aquatic accord, invigorated with zesty touch of Calabrian bergamot and the persistent aromatic tones of ivy leaves. An everlasting freshness, giving this masculine scent a real provocative effect... Contrasts appear in the middle note, for a mystic yet very elegant sensuality, that is expressed through powdery hints of orris and white cedar scents, then enhanced with mesmerizing clary sage. Noble raw materials enrich this creation: a blend of fine Cashmere wood, mixed with Crystal moss and a skin-like accord made of soft musks – and so for a deeper impact. The death’s head’s bottle of this new Police fragrance is dressed up in shiny steel, showing the sophisticated aspect of the perfume. This cold metallic appearance reveals the bold attitude of the man wearing this fragrance...

Olfactory Family: Fougere, Ambery, Woody, Aromatic.

Product.ProductName: Gillette Power Rush Antiperspirant

Gillette Power Rush Antiperspirant for men has been developed with an advanced technology that actually reacts to your body at the first sign of sweat. The reactive technology works in synch with your body so that when you sweat, the sweat molecules are captured, and freshness is released in their place. This amazing anti-odour technology is called BCD. Why is it special? It doesn't just cover odour. It actually captures odour, targets wetness and releases a fresh scent all day, so it works most when you need it most. It's tough on odour, gentle to skin.

Reactive Protection: Advanced Gillette Anti-Perspirant acts and reacts to your body at the first sign of sweat to turn odour into freshness.

Advanced Odour-Fighting Microcapsules: The advanced technology captures odour, targets wetness and releases a fresh scent all day, so it works most when you need it most.

Gentle to Skin, 0% Alcohol: The formulation engineered for men is tough on odour, and gentle to your skin.

Product.ProductName: Omved Bathbar Combo Set
Product.ProductDescription:
Omved Bathbar Combo Set consists of Best Seller Omved Bathbar Products.

Set of 3 Small Bathbar Soaps of 25 gms each.

Kamalika Lotus Vetiver Bathbar Soap – 125 Gms.

Absolutely divine, the exhilarating blend of the sensual White Lotus and the woody Vetiver make Kamalika bathbar the perfect wake-up call to a new beginning every morning of every day.

  • Lotus oil will heal what ails you bothphysically and mentally as it softens and conditions your skin.

Signature cold-process saponified, pure triple oil base of coconut, olive and castor cleanses without stripping; skin-loving Aloe Vera tones while the retained pure plant-based glycerine lends to richer moisturising.

  • This classical ancient blend of oils offers you a luxuriating and aromatic escape from everyday stress while it cleanses and moisturizes, maintains your skin's pH balance and refreshing you from top to bottom.

  • Omved Ojas Sandalwood Bathbar : Allow yourself to luxuriate in the refreshing and de-stressing aroma of divine Sandalwood. Pure Sandalwood oil has been prized since millenia, across cultures, for its anti-ageing and skin-enhancing properties. Its antiseptic, anti-fungal, cooling effect on the skin is ideal for soothing prickly heat and rashes.

  • Omved Shuddhi Neem Tulsi Bathbar : A gentle but invigorating fragrance that lingers on you even after the morning shower. An antibacterial, moisturising formula that offers you the benefits of cold-pressed Neem oil, a natural emollient and skin restorative, along with those of the Holy Basil - Tulsi, used in Ayurveda for nourishment and preservation of the skin.

  • Omved Ananda Himalayan Rose Bathbar : Indulge in the pure luxury of bathing with a million roses. It takes 40,000 pounds of rose petals to distill just 1 pound of rose oil.and we have infused this in Ananda - 100% natural aromatherapy bathbar. The exotic aromatic extracts of Himalayan roses not only smell good but also help in gentle cleansing and toning of all skin types.

  • 100% natural bath bars not just have a wonderful aroma, but they also that nature's goodness gets delivered deep inside your skin.
  • A perfect aromatic gift for your loved ones.

Product.ProductName: Calvin Klein Beauty For Women Eau De Parfum
Product.ProductDescription:
Calvin Klein's Beauty fragrance was created to celebrate the beauty of a woman. The utterly elegant and womanly fragrance developed by Sophie Labbe caters to the needs of the mature urban women.

  • Top notes: Ambrette(musk mallow) seed
  • Middle notes: The mild yet seductive fragrance of jasmine.
  • Base notes: Strong cedar fragrance.

Ten Point Guide to Check Your Perfume is Genuine :

  • The Price : If it’s too cheap or hugely discounted, there’s a high probability it’s a fake.
  • The Place : Buy your favorite perfume only from authorized and licensed retailers who clearly state this.
  • The Serial Number : Look for control numbers, batch number or the serial number. The serial number should match on the bottle and box.
  • Quality of Package : Note its thickness, clarity and overall quality. Brittle or cloudy cellophane is a red flag.
  • Spellings : An ‘authentic’ designer perfume box with a spelling mistake or print error is clearly a fake.
  • Color : Genuine fragrances are never murky or cloudy. If there are sediments or particles in the bottle, it’s a fake.
  • Container : Examine the quality of the fragrance bottle. Check for thickness, clarity, scratches, air bubbles or discoloration.
  • Look at the bottle's cap : Check the color, shape and quality of the molding.
  • Texture : Feel the fragrance between your fingers for excessive oiliness, a common sign of a fake perfume.
  • Smell : Counterfeit fragrances are often made improperly. Normally, when perfume is attached to alcohol, it is placed in cans for few days to settle. Fakes often skip this step, so the composition is messy, flat and unpleasant.

Product.ProductDescription:
Calvin Klein's Eternity Aqua for Men is a must have fragrance for every modern man. The exotic combination of woody accords and aquatic essences give a unique twist to original CK Eternity. The citrus elements make it crisp and clean, and the lavender and musk elements lend a nice calming element to it.

  • Top notes: Cucumbers, citruses, lotus and green leaves.
  • Middle notes: A blend of Sichuan pepper, Mirabelle plum, lavender and cedar.
  • Base notes: Sandalwood, Guaiac wood, patchouli and musk.

Ten Point Guide to Check Your Perfume is Genuine :

  • The Price : If it’s too cheap or hugely discounted, there’s a high probability it’s a fake.
  • The Place : Buy your favorite perfume only from authorized and licensed retailers who clearly state this.
  • The Serial Number : Look for control numbers, batch number or the serial number. The serial number should match on the bottle and box.
  • Quality of Package : Note its thickness, clarity and overall quality. Brittle or cloudy cellophane is a red flag.
  • Spellings : An ‘authentic’ designer perfume box with a spelling mistake or print error is clearly a fake.
  • Color : Genuine fragrances are never murky or cloudy. If there are sediments or particles in the bottle, it’s a fake.
  • Container : Examine the quality of the fragrance bottle. Check for thickness, clarity, scratches, air bubbles or discoloration.
  • Look at the bottle's cap : Check the color, shape and quality of the molding.
  • Texture : Feel the fragrance between your fingers for excessive oiliness, a common sign of a fake perfume.
  • Smell : Counterfeit fragrances are often made improperly. Normally, when perfume is attached to alcohol, it is placed in cans for few days to settle. Fakes often skip this step, so the composition is messy, flat and unpleasant.

Product.ProductName: Calvin Klein Encounter For Men Eau De Toilette
Product.ProductDescription:
Masculine.Intriguing.Seductive.

Encounter Calvin Klein redefines modern, unapologetic masculinity. A distinctive sensual woody fragrance, Encounter combines an addictive blend of freshness, warm cognac and sensual woods.

Product.ProductName: Calvin Klein Euphoria For Men Eau De Toilette
Product.ProductDescription:
Calvin Klein Euphoria for Men EDT is a fresh fragrance with strong citrus and woody notes. The fragrance is filled with ginger and pepper aroma with a slight hint of suede and patchouli to make it the classic men's fragrance.

  • Top notes: Ginger and pepper.
  • Middle notes: Black basil, sage and cedar.
  • Base notes: Amber, patchouli, brazilian redwood and suede.

Product.ProductName: Calvin Klein CK Be For Men Eau De Toilette
Product.ProductDescription:
Dedicated to unity and equality, Calvin Klein's Be for Men EDT is a strong fragrance for quintessential masculine man. The fragrance was created around the theme of "being yourself". The fragrance is a part of CK's WE range of perfumes.

  • Top notes: Bergamot, mandarin, juniper, lavender, peppermint and green notes
  • Middle notes: Jasmine, orchid, freesia, magnolia with a fresh hint of peach.
  • Base notes: Cedar, amber, musk, sandal and vanilla.

Product.ProductName: L'Occitane Aromachologie Volumizing Conditioner
Product.ProductDescription: Boost your hair's body and vitality with Aromachologie Volumizing Conditioner, formulated with a volumizing vegetable-origin complex and energizing essential oils from Provence. This silicone-free conditioner, made with a vegetable-origin complex and enriched with vitamin B5, leaves the hair full of volume, detangled, and easier to style. The addition of the essential oils of artemesia, sweet orange, mint, pine and rosemary bring nutrients to the hair and scalp, leaving behind a subtle pleasant fragrance. This conditioner is suitable for fine to normal hair. For best results, combine with Aromachologie Volumizing Shampoo.

Product.ProductName: L'Occitane Pivoine Flora Eau De Toilette Roll-On
Product.ProductDescription:
The soft caress of petals brushing against your neck... Paeonia Eau de Toilette captures the subtle aura of the peony, a flower with a thousand petals, in a generous floral perfume marked with green freshness. This luxurious portable roll-on contains a more intense version of the fragrance for fragrant touch-ups throughout the day. Contains a peony extract from the south of France (Drôme).

Product.ProductName: L'Occitane Aromachologie Repairing Shampoo
Product.ProductDescription: Transform your hair from dry and damaged to strong and shiny with the Aromachologie Repairing Shampoo. Our new formula contains an anti-breakage complex, made with five essential oils (ylang-ylang, sweet orange, lavender, geranium, angelica) and plant-derived amino acids, which help repair the hair fiber. Its silicone-free formula also helps smooth hair scales and envelops even the most fragile hair in softness. Additionally, Vitamin B5 has been added in order to help smooth, soften and protect hair fibers.

Product.ProductName: L'Occitane Aromachologie Volumizing Shampoo
Product.ProductDescription:
Boost your hair's body and vitality with Aromachologie Volumizing Shampoo, formulated with a volumizing vegetable-origin complex and energizing essential oils from Provence.

Our silicone-free formula gently cleanses, while acting on both the roots and the length of the hair to add body while keeping tresses lightweight. The essential oils of artemesia, sweet orange, mint, pine and rosemary bring nutrients to the hair and scalp, and are known for adding gloss.

This shampoo is suitable for fine to normal hair. For best results, combine with Aromachologie Volumizing Conditioner.

Product.ProductName: L'Occitane Cherry Blossom Shimmering Lotion
Product.ProductDescription: Enriched with shea butter with its nourishing properties, this body lotion has a light texture that is quickly absorbed, leaving an iridescent veil on the body. The skin is moisturised and perfumed with a delicate and enveloping flowery scent.

Product.ProductName: Crabtree & Evelyn La Source Relaxing Body Wash
Product.ProductDescription:
Soothe and moisturize your skin everyday with our pH balanced body wash, enriched with skin conditioning oat amino acids, soothing milk proteins and nourishing marine extracts.Fragrances with a relaxing sea scent, our La Source Body Wash will transform daily rituals into moments as refreshing as ocean spray.

  • Soothing And Moisturizing.
  • PH Balanced.
  • Skin conditioning.

Product.ProductName: Crabtree & Evelyn Pomegranate Argan & Grapeseed Shower Gel
Product.ProductDescription:
Our rich lathering Pomegranate,Argan & Grapeseed Shower Gel gently cleanses and softens the skin. A conditioning blend of anti oxidant rich pomegranate and grapeseed extracts,along with nourishing argan,helps replenish the skin for a smooth and supple finish. Our bath and shower gel is free of parabens, mineral oil, and propylene glycol.

  • Formulated with a gentle surfactant derived from argan.
  • Moisturises, softens, and conditions.
  • Free of parabens, mineral oil, and propylene glycol.

Product.ProductName: Crabtree & Evelyn La Source Refreshing Body Mist
Product.ProductDescription:
Awaken your senses with our La Source Refreshing Body Mist featuring conditioning marine extracts and the revitalising scent of aquatic notes, musk, and gentle sea breezes.

  • A refreshing and revitalising treat for the skin.
  • Marine extracts help smooth and condition.
  • Free of parabens, mineral oil, and propylene glycol.

Fragrance :A crisp, clean scent of refreshing aquatic notes, musk, and gentle shoreline breezes.

Product.ProductName: Crabtree & Evelyn Lily Room Spray
Product.ProductDescription:
Transform your living space with the fresh and spirited fragrance of Lily.

  • Highly diffusive spray lightly fragrances any room.
  • Can be used to revitalize scented drawer liners.
  • Non-aerosol formula is safe for the environment.

Fragrance :A heart of lily of the valley blended with dewy greens,woodland mosses, musk, and ylang ylang.

Product.ProductName: L'Occitane Almond Shower Oil
Product.ProductDescription: Almond Shower Oil is one of our top ten best sellers around the world! It transforms into a lavish, softening foam that leaves a satin-like softness all over the body. Rich in almond oil and nourishing lipids, the Almond Shower Oil cleanses gently to impart a delectable perfume.

Product.ProductName: Roberto Cavalli Just Gold For Him Eau De Parfum
Product.ProductDescription:
The exhilaration of excess – that is his addiction. Powerfully charismatic and boldly masculine, Just Gold For Him is a spicy woody eau de parfum composed by Domitille Berthier (IFF). Vibrant top notes of black pepper, cardamom and nutmeg are blended with an original ristretto coffee harmony in the heart, a homage to Roberto Cavalli’s Italian roots. Lingering on the skin, the dry-down of vetiver and leather is sensual and supremely virile.

  • Top Note : Black pepper.
  • Heart Note : Cardamom and Nutmeg are blended with an original ristretto coffee harmony in the heart, a homage to Roberto Cavalli’s Italian roots.
  • Base Note : Vetiver and Leather is sensual and supremely virile.

Product.ProductName: Roberto Cavalli Just Gold For Her Eau De Parfum
Product.ProductDescription:
To desire and be desired – that is her destiny. Taking sensuality to new extremes, Just Gold For Her is an intensely seductive floral oriental eau de parfum created by Fabrice Pellegrin (Firmenich). Teasing top notes of hazelnut and mandarin lead into an alluring heart of luminous jasmine, luscious marshmallow and woody orris. In the dry-down, notes of leather and palisander wood create a sexily sweet aura that seems to fuse with the warmth of her skin.

  • Top Note : Hazelnut and Mandarin lead
  • Heart Note: An alluring heart of luminous jasmine, luscious marshmallow and woody orris.
  • Base Note: Notes of leather and palisander wood create a sexily sweet aura that seems to fuse with the warmth of her skin.

Product.ProductName: Roberto Cavalli Just Cavalli Eau De Toilette Spray For Women
Product.ProductDescription:
Just Cavalli For Her opens with a sizzling note of wild pimento, a powerful symbol of virility and seduction. This striking introduction is closely followed by a sophisticated and sensual heart note of vetiver wood that gives an earthly and slightly smoky quality to the fragrance. The base note of smooth leather adds its rich mix of depth and voluptuousness. Fresh, vibrant and sensual, this fragrance is an ode to youth and seduction.

Product.ProductName: Roberto Cavalli Acqua Eau De Toilette Spray
Product.ProductDescription:
Radiant and luminous, Roberto Cavalli Acqua echoes the designer’s passion for the sea. A consummate sailor, Roberto Cavalli loves exploring the Mediterranean Sea. Roberto Cavalli Acqua was inspired by these journeys in search of new ideas. A sparkling floral, it is conceived as a delicate bouquet of aquatic jasmine and lily of the valley. Lighter and brighter than Roberto Cavalli’s signature perfume, it is a hymn to freedom and happiness. Its blue dress adequately illustrates its maritime influence.

Product.ProductName: Roberto Cavalli Nero Assoluto Eau De Parfum
Product.ProductDescription:
Sophisticated and glamorous, Roberto Cavalli Nero Assoluto reveals the most refined and elegant dimension of the couturier’s universe. More mysterious and intense than Roberto Cavalli’s signature perfume, it is an uncompromisingly nocturnal variation. This musky floral fragrance blends the intoxicating power of the orchid flower and the deep sensuality of black vanilla. Its dark dress is a token of sobriety and sophistication.

Product.ProductName: Yves Saint Laurent Manifesto Eau De Parfum
Product.ProductDescription:
Manifesto is the expression of audacity, excess, and desire. A bouquet of jasmine punctuated by green notes and a bold trail combining wood, vanilla, and tonka beans are the signature of this new declaration of femininity. In a flacon reminiscent of the silhouette of a woman.

  • Top notes : Black current, Bergamot
  • Middle notes : Jasmine, Lily of the valley
  • Base notes : Vanilla, Tonka bean and Cedar wood.

Product.ProductName: Yves Saint Laurent Parisienne L'Eau De Toilette
Product.ProductDescription:
Parisienne l'Eau by Yves Saint Laurent is a sensuous bouquet for the woman whose heart belongs to Paris even if home is elsewhere. A voluptuous floral accord of violet, damask rose and tart blackberry seems to tell the whole story. But then comes the fullness of sandalwood, deepened by musk and brightened by peonies, tying the endnotes to the ones beginning.

  • Top notes : Violet leaves and Rose
  • Middle notes : Black currant and Red berries
  • Base notes : Musk, Cedar and Peonies.

Product.ProductName: Yves Saint Laurent L'Homme Sport Eau De Toilette
Product.ProductDescription:
A magnetic, fierce blend of woody freshness, with a wave of citrus notes warmed by a sensual, ambery trail- L’Homme Sport, the elegant smell of new freshness is composed of Bergamont, Cardamom, and Vetiver. Far away, a thrilling ride. A man on the road for a ride between exhilaration and pleasure, and your are the witness of his trip to exaltation. Elegant, like every YSL man. Powerful, he controls the situation. Virile, he is definitely sexy. A rebel who rides his bike with unstoppable force, always on the lookout for the next exhilarating adventure, his body, his energy, his fragrance are an invitation to exaltation. Dare to take a ride.

  • Top notes : Bergamot and Verbena
  • Middle notes : Woody, Cardamom
  • Base notes : Amber and Cedar

Product.ProductName: Diesel Fuel For Life Homme Eau De Toilette
Product.ProductDescription:
A mythical elixir that evokes images of something that's a source of energy and fuels a passion for life. These emotions combined with sexiness and seduction is exactly what we have recreated and bottled. It's Fuel for Life. Use with caution!

  • Top notes : Star anise and Pink pepper.
  • Middle notes : Raspberry and Lavender.
  • Base notes : Vetiver and Heliotrope.

Product.ProductName: Diesel Fuel For Life Unlimited Eau De Parfum
Product.ProductDescription:
Resolutely feminine, utterly effervescent and undeniably sensual, an elixir For Women Only... A manifesto for nonchalance, Fuel For Life Unlimited is an ecstatic passport to a narrow escape. Fuel for Life Unlimited combines sparkling golden fruity notes with a spicy, floral heart, and mysterious waves of wood and peach. A new precious and sophisticated elixir is born. FOR WOMEN ONLY!!

  • Notes : Bergamot, Licorice, Star anise, Lemon and White flowers.

  • Container : Examine the quality of the fragrance bottle. Check for thickness, clarity, scratches, air bubbles or discoloration.
  • Look at the bottle's cap : Check the color, shape and quality of the molding.
  • Texture : Feel the fragrance between your fingers for excessive oiliness, a common sign of a fake perfume.
  • Smell : Counterfeit fragrances are often made improperly. Normally, when perfume is attached to alcohol, it is placed in cans for few days to settle. Fakes often skip this step, so the composition is messy, flat and unpleasant.

Product.ProductName: Ralph Lauren Big Pony 4 Eau De Toilette
Product.ProductDescription:
An energizing boost that layers mandarin and kyarawood for a one-of-a-kind, stylish edge that represents the game of style and the opportunity to express individuality.

  • Primary notes : Mandarin, Pear, Kyarawood.
  • Secondary notes :Bergamot, Sage, Amber.

Product.ProductName: Ralph Lauren Polo Blue Eau De Toilette
Product.ProductDescription:
Cool fresh, warm spice, the fragrance that evokes the freedom of the big, blue sky, the energy of the open waters and the invigorating blast of fresh air. Polo Blue is the symbol of casual modern elegance. The royal blue bottle with silver accents reflects the beautiful blue sky and brilliant sun reflecting on the crystal blue waters.

  • Top notes : Melon De Cavaillon, Lush Watery Melon, Fresh Sliced Cucumber, Tangerine.
  • Middle notes : Basil, Clary Sage Absolute, Geranium.
  • Base notes : Washed Suede, Velvety Moss, Amber, Melon, Basil, Amber Patchouli, Sheer Musk.

Product.ProductName: Ralph Lauren Polo Black Eau De Toilette
Product.ProductDescription:
For the sexy, sophisticated, confident man, Polo Black is a bold fusion of iced mango, silver armoise and patchouli noir. Modern and masculine, the bottle, with its strong shoulders, is inspired by Polo’s signature flask design but reinterpreted with a silver cap and an oversized Polo pony logo in silver.

  • Top notes : Iced Mango, Spanish Sage.
  • Middle notes : Lush Liquid Accord, Silver Armoise.
  • Base notes : Black Patchouli, Tonka Bean, Sandalwood.

Product.ProductName: Ralph Lauren Polo Eau De Toilette
Product.ProductDescription:
Polo launched in 1978 as the first lifestyle fragrance and has maintained a top 15 ranking in the US for 30 years. The signature Ralph Lauren fragrance, Polo is a true classic that captures the rich heritage of the thoroughbred sporting tradition. In its iconic flask-inspired bottle, Polo is a bold and masculine fragrance with a distinctive and invigorating blend of leather, wood and tobacco.

  • Top notes : Canadian Pine, Eucalyptus.
  • Middle notes : Lavender, Coriander.
  • Base notes : Vetiver, Patchouli, Leather Notes.

Product.ProductDescription:
Exotic and sparkling, Roberto Cavalli Exotica stands for the designer’s unremitting love for nature. A perfect counterpoint to the wild animals he reveres, the vegetal world has always been a source of inspiration for him. It was once more illustrated by the magnificent floral prints that were presented in his couture collections.

  • Roberto Cavalli Exotica is a lighter and fresher interpretation of Roberto Cavalli’s signature perfume.
  • A fruity exotic floral, it artfully mixes tropical notes of mango and frangipani flower.
  • The shiny pink dress adequately represents the joyful and ultra-feminine dimension of the fragrance.

Just Cavalli For Her opens with a sizzling note of wild pimento, a powerful symbol of virility and seduction. This striking introduction is closely followed by a sophisticated and sensual heart note of vetiver wood that gives an earthly and slighty smoky quality to the fragrance. The base note of smooth leather adds its rich mix of depth and voluptuousness. Fresh, vibrant and sensual, this fragrance is an ode to youth and seduction.

Product.ProductDescription: Easy to apply, high shine lip gloss, vanilla flavored (yum!). Let your lips do the talking!!

Product.ProductName: NYX Mosaic Powder Blush
Product.ProductDescription:
Blush your cheeks with NYX Mosaic Powder Blush. This blush comes with five selected colours in one pallet to match your skin; giving you a perfect blush.

  • It is multi-purpose; can be used as a blush, highlighter or eye shadow.
  • Infused with the goodness of minerals it helps to hydrate the skin.
  • It is easy to blend and work with.
  • It leaves a subtle glow to the skin.

Additional Information: Founded in 1999, it is now one of the most loved and trusted brands around the world. With its wide range of cosmetics completing the needs of a makeup artist to a savvy woman. Available in five shades.

Product.ProductDescription:

Product.ProductDescription:
Get the dazzling and dramatic eyes with Maybelline Hyper Glossy Electrics Eyeliner. This highly intense electrifying eyeliner makes your eye stand out. Maybelline Hyper Glossy Eyeliner will allow you to style your eyes the way you like.

Product.ProductName: L'Oreal Paris Voluminous Papillon Waterproof Mascara
Product.ProductDescription:
Extend your lashes with L’Oreal Paris Papillon Mascara. It is an revolutionary mascara which gives your lashes winked out effect. The brush is made with cacoon fibre that wraps the eyelashes.

  • It stretches the lashes to corner.
  • The wing-tip brush that lengthens, stretches and volumises every lash.
  • It applies evenly and does not leave any lumps.
  • It does not smudge and last for long hours.
  • It defines and separates each lash.

Additional Information:L’oreal is a French company and leading beauty brand across the world. They have the best quality and wide range of products. L’Oreal Paris Butterfly Mascara will give you fluttering eyelashes.

Product.ProductName: Lakme Absolute Gel Addict Eyeliner
Product.ProductDescription:
Line your eye with the colourful range of gel eyeliners by Lakme Absolute Gel Addict. Smooth texture that glides easily on the eyelid. Lakme Absolute Gel Addict is highly pigmented to give you the bold and confident look.

  • An intense gel liner gives a professional finish.
  • It is long lasting stay and waterproof.
  • It does not smudge or smear over the time.
  • The brush is attached with the cap, which is easy to use.
  • It glides smoothly.

Additional Information: Lakme Absolute Gel Addict is packed in a pot with a long sleek cap, which has the applicator brush attached in it. So now get your eyes winked in bold vivid colours for a ramp ready look.

Product.ProductName: L'oreal Paris Magic Nude Liquid Powder
Product.ProductDescription:
L'oreal Paris Magic Nude Liquid Powder that looks like a foundation but as you blend in it transforms into powder. Ideal for people with oily skin as it is non-greasy. L'oreal Paris Magic Nude Liquid Powder blends well into the skin.It gives a natural look.

  • It gives complete coverage.
  • It reduces the redness on the face.
  • It covers dark spots, acne and blemish marks.
  • It covers skin pigmentation giving an even skin tone.
  • It gives your skin a semi-matte finish, not making your skin oily.
  • It is available in six shades to match your skin tone.

Additional Information: L’oreal is a French company and leading beauty brand across the world. L'oreal Paris Magic Nude Liquid Powder promises to keep you looking flawless and radiant skin for long hours, without drying your skin.

Product.ProductName: Colorbar Just Smoky Eye Pencil
Product.ProductDescription: Just Smoky Kajal gets you Glam ready in just 50 seconds. This long-lasting, multi-tasking eye pencil gives you 3-in-1 benefits of an Eyeliner, Kajal and an Eye Shadow. It helps you to achieve the mysterious smoky-eyed look which will last for up to 12 hours. It comes with a built-in smudger that is as soft as a cushion which can be used to demystify the art of smoky eyes. The intense color and matte texture of the pencil adds definition and drama to your eyes. It has waterproof property and does not transfer.

Product.ProductName: Real Techniques Powder Brush
Product.ProductDescription:
Designed with pro makeup artist Sam + Nic Chapman Real Techniques brushes combine high-tech materials with innovative design to make creating a pixel-perfect look easier than ever: Synthetic bristles are ultra-plush and smoother than the hair you’ll find in other brushes. Since taklon is synthetic it’s 100% cruelty-free. The soft fibers help create a flawless high-definition finish in any type of light from sunlight to harsh indoor lighting. The color-coded system corresponds to the key steps of makeup application so you can create a flawless base enhanced eyes and the perfect finish like a pro. Each brush head is hand-cut to the perfect shape allowing for precise application from dense coverage to a soft delicate finish. The collection is suitable for a wide range of products and every makeup need from powders creams and liquids to mineral makeup highlighter and shimmer. Brush names on the handles make for easy reference when creating your favorite look.

Features:

  • Look pixel-perfect even in harsh light.
  • Ultra-plush synthetic bristles are hand-cut and 100% cruelty-free.
  • Self-standing for easy storage.
  • Extended aluminum handle is light and easy to use.

Product.ProductName: L'Oreal Paris Night Glam Kit - Silver
Product.ProductDescription:
L'Oreal Paris Night Glam Kit - Silver contains:

L'Oreal Paris Kajal Magique - Black :

Get the best for your eyes with the all new L’Oreal Paris Kajal Magique. Infused with the goodness of cocoa butter, Vitamin E and olive oil esters, it glides like butter. The mineral pigments deliver deep black color in a single stroke. Use it on your lash line or as eyeliner, the vivid bold strokes would add instant definition to your eyes.

L'Oreal Paris Color Riche Le Vernis - Vendome Pearl :

With a formula that combines rich pigments, pearlescents and optical effects, L'oreal Paris Color Riche Le Vernis offers an extensive collection of 49 modern and fashionable shades. The mini 5ml bottle allows every woman to mix and match her favourite hues from the range to complement her every mood, occasion and look.

L'Oreal Glam Shine Lip Crayon Lychee Lust :

L'Oreal Paris introduces its first glossy crayon format for that looks after your lips. Balm and Gloss finally combined in an playful crayon format for mirror free application. Lips feel moisturised, look shiny with a sheer fresh looking colour pay off.

L'Oreal Superliner Gelmatic Eyeliner :

L'Oreal Paris introduces its first gel eye liner in a pen format. Quick, precise and easy application combined with intense matte colour pay off for just a stroke of audacity. Comes in two rich, luxurious shades.

Product.ProductName: VLCC Natural Sciences Kajal
Product.ProductDescription:
Enhance your look with unique formulation of VLCC Natural Sciences Kajal.

  • It contains liquorice and camphor which does not harm your eyes. It gives you stylish, classy look.
  • With its one of a kind formula kajal once applied does not fade away for long time.
  • It glides perfectly and gives intense color to your eyes.
  • After application kajal relaxes and soothes your eyes. For better vision this kajal consists of Triphala.

Additional Information:VLCC was founded in 1989 with the vision of transforming life of every individual. To redefine wellness it brings wide range of beauty products. VLCC Kajal is an ideal product for every woman who wants to enhance their beauty.

Product.ProductName: Fran Wilson Moodmatcher Lipstick - Light Blue
Product.ProductDescription:
Each shade changes according to your body chemistry for a truly personalized lip color. Experience the rich, natural moisturizing and super-long-lasting 12-hour powers of this color bomb that just won't wear off, even when eating, drinking or kissing!

Key Features :

  • 12-hour staying power.
  • Moisture rich and revitalizing with Aloe Vera and Vitamin E.
  • Matt based sheen.

Product.ProductName: Za True White Two Way Foundation Case + Refill
Product.ProductDescription:
• This compact light-weight powdery foundation minimizes the appearance of dark spots giving a pearly, radiant finish. Its Vitamin C ingredients diminish melanin formation while the SPF 20-PA++ protects skin from UVA and UVB.
  • Can be used wet or dry for flawless and radiant, pearly-white finish without clogging the pores.
  • True White Two-Way Foundation Case comes with two compartments, one for keeping your foundation and one to keep your sponge.
  • Available in four shades to suit Indian skin tones.

Product.ProductName: Colorbar Sheer Glass Lip Gloss
Product.ProductDescription: Shine on like a true diva with the new Colorbar Sheer Glass Lip Gloss! This exclusive formula is made unique by light magnifying technology which allows a gorgeous glass like finish on the lips with a perfect color payoff. This gloss has an enwrapping and a cushiony texture that not only locks the lip color but also keep them moisturized and nourished. Colorbar Sheer Glass Lip Gloss comes with lip care benefits it is Preservative Free, Allergen Free, Nano Ingredient Free, Perfume Free and is Dermatologically Tested.

Product.ProductName: Colorbar Pro Mini Collection Tentalize Nail Kit
Product.ProductDescription:

This kit is not only good for self-indulgence but also a perfect gift for a loved ones.

Product.ProductName: Colorbar Shimmer Bar
Product.ProductDescription:
Colorbar Shimmer Bar is an all in one eyeshadow palette. This brilliant eye shadow palette comes with a blend of radiant shades. From bright corals to shimmery golds and bronze, this palette caters to all your eye shadow needs.

  • Each shade is developed to suit your mood!
  • When you feel bold sprinkle some gold eye shadow and on days when you feel sober and subtle add some coral eye shadow!

Product.ProductName: Colorbar Retractable Lip Liner
Product.ProductDescription:
Get the perfect complementary partner for your lipstick! Colorbar Lip Liner is a creamy lip liner which is easy to apply on the thin lip outlines. The lip liner gives a definition to your lips and complements your lip shade. The waterproof formula nourishes your lips without smudging into your lip shade. The lip liner also acts as a lip filler and cover every corner of your lip which your normal lipstick cannot reach.

  • Comes with a sharpener to give precise definition.
  • Extremely matte formula stays for longer hours.
  • Available in 3 different shades.

Product.ProductName: Colorbar Full Cover Makeup Stick
Product.ProductDescription:
A non greasy oil free formula Colorbar Full Cover Makeup Stick is ideal for women who hate the long process of applying primers and concealers. The easy to apply makeup stick is a concealer cum foundation. The non greasy formula gives a matte look without drying out the delicate facial skin. It nourishes skin and after application skin feels smooth and soft to touch.

  • Non oily so prevents breakouts.
  • Doesn't clog pores.

Product.ProductName: Colorbar True Gloss
Product.ProductDescription:
The Colorbar True Gloss is a thick, creamy and hydrating gloss which does not feel heavy or sticky on application. This lip gloss is intensely hydrates lips and gives a glossy healthy finish to the lips.

  • The gloss is intensely pigmented and a single coat is enough for full coverage.
  • It lasts for longer hours without smudging or smearing.
  • The staying power is so high that it will go on even after meals and drinks, so no need to worry about touch ups with this stellar lip gloss.
  • Available in ten different shades.

Additional Information: The true glosses come in an elongated and classy tube with a silver cap. It comes with a sponge doe foot applicator which applies the product evenly in a single coat.

Product.ProductName: Colorbar Triple Effect Makeup
Product.ProductDescription:
A three in one product that is a perfect mix of concealer, foundation and compact. It is incredibly light and smooth and glides on as a cream and turns into a silky powder.

  • Its unique texture makes your skin luminous and glowing and has a long lasting finish.
  • It contains sunscreen protection and Vitamin E which has nourishing and anti-ageing benefits.

Product.ProductName: Colorbar Definer Lip Liner
Product.ProductDescription:
Say no to unruly and undefined lipshades with Colorbar's Definer Lipliner. It is a sleek lip pencil which provides maximum color to your lips. It's a superstar lipliner which gives long lasting coverage and radiant colour to your lips. Give defiinition to your lips while nourishing your lips. The lipliner doesn't fade out and stays on for long.

  • Available in 8 universally flattering shades.
  • Can be used as a lipstick for complete matt look.

Product.ProductName: Colorbar Cheekillusion Blush New
Product.ProductDescription:
The ideal daily wear blush which lasts longer without making your cheeks look cakey or powdery. The Colorbar Cheekillusion Blush blends smoothly on skin without making it oily or shiny. The matte finish blush is perfect for day wear and gives your skin a natural glow. The natural and light weight blush is not too pale and not too shine it is an ideal work to party blush. The satin finish blush has decent pigmentation level and prevent any kind of fallouts.

  • Availabe in 6 shades.
  • Dermatologically tested.

Product.ProductName: Colorbar Ultimate Creme Makeup Remover All Skin Types
Product.ProductDescription:
Bid adeiu to harsh makeup removers and make way for Colorbar Ultimate Creme Makeup Remover. It is a makeup remover which is specially developed for sensitive skin. Unlike other makeup removers which cause dry skin, this remover hydrates and removes impurities gently.

  • The makeup remover doesn't leave an oily residue behind and it is mildly fragranced to suit all skin types.
  • It is infused with Chamomile extracts hence it soothes skin's texture.
  • It is dermatologically tested hence it can be used on highly sensitive skin.
  • It is enriched with Vitamin E and Pro Vitamin B5 which protect skin cells from UV rays and pollution. The skin friendly bi-phase formula also hydrates and soothes the skin while protecting it against harmful irritants.
  • With Jojoba Oil which softens the skin and minimizes the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
  • The nourishing crème formula also contains Onion, Khus and Fenugreek extracts to deeply condition and protect dry and damaged skin from external aggravation.

Additional Information: The Colorbar Ultimate Makeup Remover comes in a sturdy and travel friendly pack so you can carry it wherever you go!

Product.ProductName: Colorbar Ultimate Creme Makeup Remover Oily and Combination Skin
Product.ProductDescription: Colorbar Ultimate Creme Makeup Remover Oily and Combination Skin cleanses your skin while caring for it. The dual-action make up remover that removes all traces of make up from lids, lashes, lips and all over the face leaving the skin refreshed and softly cleansed.

Product.ProductName: Colorbar Ultimate Creme Makeup Remover Dry Skin
Product.ProductDescription:
The perfect make up remover for all skin types; a different remover for individual needs. It gently cares for and cleanses the skin while removing makeup leaving no traces behind.

  • It can be used to remove all types of makeup including waterproof makeup.
  • No need to scrub your skin to remove makeup anymore, one swipe with this make up remover is more than enough.
  • It is rich in emollients which nourish and moisturise your skin as you wipe your makeup off.

Product.ProductName: Colorbar Glitterati Top Coat
Product.ProductDescription:
Be the star of any party with Colobar Glitterati Top Coat! The full coverage glitter paint has a brilliant finishing touch and will leave your nails looking glamorous. It's nail jewelery which is easy on the pocket and high on style! Add some glitter to your look with these long lasting top coats from Colorbar.

  • Available in 8 dazzling shades.
  • One stroke is enough to add all the shine to your nails.

Product.ProductName: Colorbar Time Plus Pro Long Stay Makeup Base New
Product.ProductDescription:
Colorbar Time Plus Pro Long Stay Makeup Base will give you complete coverage and stays on for long hours. This is a light base foundation which blends easily and quickly into the skin and gives complete coverage. Colorbar Time Plus Pro Long Stay Makeup Base is enriched with Vitamin E that adds in moisture to the skin and also has SPF15 that protect form sun damage.

  • It is non-oily and gives a matte look which appears very natural.
  • Stay on for long hours without getting greasy or patchy.
  • It has a very smooth non-gloppy base which makes it easy to blend.
  • It also controls oiliness and give a very natural matte look.
  • It gives a good coverage.

Additional Information: Colorbar Time Plus Pro Foundation comes in a Squeeze tube that is fitted with a Silver Screw cap. This Squeeze Tube is very convenient & it easily delivers the required amount of product for application. a perfect addition to every girls makeup kit!

Product.ProductName: Colorbar Sheer Creme Lust Lipcolor
Product.ProductDescription:
Colorbar's revolutionary new lipstick - Sheer Creme Lust is formulated with a special combination of light oils and groundbreaking polymers that offer soft consistency to enrich your lips with flawless hold and unparalleled luminosity. These range of 12 exciting shades that will add an all new depth, dimension and mirror-like shine to your lips. Ranging from nudes to fashion tones this range offers a silky texture and luxurious finish that makes your lips look fabulous.

This unique range of deliciously bold lip colors will make your lips glisten with the wet look of a gloss and comfort and color purity of a lipstick.

Product.ProductName: Colorbar Matte Touch Lipstick
Product.ProductDescription:
Colorbar Matte Touch Lipstick features the traditional glamour properties of a matte lipstick - intense colour and semi-matte velvety finish while offering a creamier, softer, more glide-on application. Non-caking, non drying. Moisturizing and incredibly wearable yet absolutely matte.

It comes with unique bullet shape for differentiation and providing an edge of innovation.

Features:

  • Sun Protecting property which nourishes and protect lips against UV rays.
  • Vitamin E - preservative and natural antioxidant against skin aging.
  • Non Caking will not dry lips.
  • Extremely Long-lasting.
  • Not tested on animals

Product.ProductName: Colorbar Metallic Nail Lacquer
Product.ProductDescription:
Calling all fashionistas who love the spotlight, Colorbar's hot new palette of Metallic Nail Lacquer has arrived. Send shockwaves of glimmer and shine with this electrifying hot palette of metallic nail shades which promise to perfectly compliment your party oufit. Move over ordinary nail colors. Colorbar Metallic Nail Lacquer is nail jewellery, literally.

Try this finger-to-toe bling nail lacquer that has a fuss free one stroke application and brilliant finishing touch. It is also loaded with nail care benefits - it is toluene & DBP free and does not cause yellowing of nails or chipping. So don???t resist the lure of these 12 sizzling metallic shades and get ready to dazzle!

Product.ProductName: Colorbar Timeless Filling And Lifting Compact
Product.ProductDescription:
A versatile and easy to carry, full coverage compact that lightens and freshens the skin. It has anti ageing properties and is meant specially for mature skin.

  • It has a smooth, matte finish that keeps you skin shine free all day long.
  • It is easy to apply and blends well.
  • It is in a convenient, compact packaging that you can carry easily.

Product.ProductName: Revlon Color Burst Lip Butter
Product.ProductDescription:
Revlon Color Burst Lip Butter is enriched with mango, shea and coconut butter. It boosts lip moisture by 156%. The pampering gel formula provides super charged hydration. It offers sheer to medium color with a buttery shine.

94% of women felt lips were softer, smoother and instantly hydrated. Available in 5 irresistible shades.

Starting with clean, dry lips apply your favorite shade of Revlon ColorBurst Lip Butter onto lips. Revlon ColorBurst Lip Butter can be worn with or without Lipliner. Reapply as often as desired for softer, smoother and instantly hydrated lips!

Product.ProductName: Revlon Colorstay Concealer
Product.ProductDescription:
Revlon Colorstay Concealers comes in a smooth consistency which makes it easy to blend in without leaving it look patchy. It comes with a sponge-based doe-foot applicator making it easy and non-messy. Giving medium coverage to blemish and dark circles. It is formulated with salicylic acid to help heal blemishes fast.

  • Feels lightweight and comfortable on skin.
  • Smooth consistency for easy application.
  • Does not crease.
  • Easy to blend and cover.
  • Non-messy and non-greasy.

Product.ProductName: Bourjois Contour Clubbing Waterproof
Product.ProductDescription:
Discover the new contour clubbing waterproof eye pencil, ideal for those ultra-crazy nights out!

The Contour Clubbing Waterproof eye pencil is the perfect finishing touch to a smoky look.

Its waterproof formula is crease-resistant and makes for a perfect adherence of the colour. Its ultra-soft gliding texture enriched with jojoba and cotton oils intensely outlines the lash line.

Ophthalmologically tested.

Product.ProductName: Bourjois Magic Nail Polish Remover
Product.ProductDescription:
Abra-cadabra!!!

Magic in a pot!

Nail polish is instantly removed with the touch of a magic wand!

Your nails will be polish-free in just 1 second!

Plus, its red berry and vanilla fragrance leaves nails delicately scented.

And…it's good for nails!

  • Acetone-free formula - gentle on nails and cuticles.
  • Enriched with nourishing sweet almond oil.
  • Paraben-free.
  • Dermatologically tested.

Product.ProductName: Bourjois Liner Feutre
Product.ProductDescription:
Easy To Apply, Long Lasting Felt-Tip Eyeliner.

A soft felt-tip eyeliner for ultra easy application and long lasting effect.

This soft tip will allow every fashionista to dress their eyes as celebrities in a ultra easy way.

Product.ProductName: Bourjois New Effet 3D Lipgloss
Product.ProductDescription:
Our iconic Effet 3D lipgloss has had a makeover for its 10th year anniversary with a new formula, new shades and a new sleek packaging!Its formula is now paraben-free and contains 92% of hydrating and nourishing protective agents for a real balm action whilte still enriched with micro crystalline wax for a deep, voluminous and ultra-shiny result.

You can now treat your lips to our historic 3 Dimensional volume for a super glossy plumped-up pout, while keeping them hydrated for 8 hours!

The specially designed brush applicator is even more precise for an easier application!

Product.ProductName: Bourjois 1 Seconde Nail Enamel
Product.ProductDescription:
A Professional Manicure Result In 1 Second Per Nail!

Not only is our Bourjois 1 seconde Nail enamel easy and speedy to apply but it gives your nails that salon smooth finish in after 1 second. thanks to its gel texture.

  • Toluene
  • DBP
  • Acetone
  • Phthalates

All our formulas are systematically tested and subjected to 3 strict levels of control:

  • Strict selection of raw materials used, in terms of quality and traceability.
  • Before validation, formulas are safety-assessed by a toxicological expert.
  • Each production batch is strictly checked to ensure the quality of our finished products.

Bourjois therefore applies the strictest requirements in developing all its products in its concern to offer maximum safety to its customers.

Product.ProductName: Olay Total Effects 7-In-1 Anti-Aging Night Cream
Product.ProductDescription:
The Olay Story :

Olay is a product truly born from love, as it was created by a man as a gift for his wife. In the 1950s, chemist Graham Wulff saw his wife Dinah’s frustration with the thick, waxy beauty creams that left her skin looking greasy. Graham wanted to create a new beauty product for her that could not only moisturize her skin, but also leave her feeling beautiful and feminine.

Together, Graham and Dinah fine-tuned everything from absorption and texture to the instantly recognizable fragrance. At last, the legendary Oil of Olay Beauty Fluid was born.

Today, Olay is one of the most recognizable brands in the world and is the World’s No.1 selling facial skin care brand. Yet through all the changes and innovations, the philosophy upheld by Graham Wulff remains just as relevant as ever: Help women look and feel beautiful. That’s a potent formula for success.

The Olay Promise:

Olay is committed to providing safe products to our consumers. Ensuring the safety of our products is a responsibility that Olay takes very seriously. Each year, Olay conducts over 400,000 safety and quality tests to ensure an excellent experience for women around the world. For more information about the safety of Olay products and ingredients, please go to http://www.pgbeautygroomingscience.com/safety.html

  • Uneven Skin Tone: Balances and evens out skin tone

  • Fine Lines & Wrinkles: Reducing the appearance of fine lines & wrinkles
  • Age Spots: Reduces the appearance of age spots
  • Dullness: Gives skin a healthy glow
  • Pores: Minimizes the appearance of pores

Key Features :

  • Helps fight the 7 signs of skin ageing to give you visibly younger looking skin
  • Balances and evens out your skin tone
  • Provides nourishing skin moisturization to reduce skin dryness
  • Reduces dullness and gives your skin a healthy glow

Product.ProductName: L'Oreal Paris Youth Code Youth Booster Serum
Product.ProductDescription:
Mature skin and young skin behave differently when exposed to external aggressions. As you age, skin takes longer to recover and responds more slowly. The complexion loses luminosity, facial features appear tired and wrinkles deepen.

The Pro-Gen Technology in L'Oreal Paris Youth Code Youth Boosting Serum boosts gene activity of the skin by increasing the expression of recovery genes involved in cellular renewal. This speeds up the action of sluggish recovery genes in aging skin and thus skin repairs itself much faster.

Effects of aging in skin are slowed down with the use of the ingredient Adenosine.

Hydroxy Ethyl Piperazine Ethane Sulfonic (HEPES) acid helps to gently exfoliate skin with its pro-exfoliating action.

Product.ProductName: L'Oreal Paris Youth Code Night Recovery Cream
Product.ProductDescription:

Enriched with patented Pro-Gen® Technology. Applied daily, the moisturising formula helps improve the skin's ability to behave more youthfully.

Product.ProductDescription:
Everyday, your skin faces multiple aggressions such as UV rays and atmospherical pollution that trigger the creation of free radicals, responsible for attacking cells and breaking elastin and collagen fibres. The result is a deep alteration of skin and cells function.

UV Perfect gives you an inside/ out to protection against brown spots, skin darkening and premature ageing. The patented association of Mexoryl® SX and XL [XL Block] provides optimal UVB and reinforced UVA protection. To prevent dullness, the formula is enriched in Detoxyl to inhibit pollutants fixation on the skin.

The ultimate UV & pollution shield, for a provenlonglasting protection for your skin!

A powerful Anti-Oxidant Complex now supplements Activa Cell in the formula, to reinforce protection against free radicals and better shield cells, elastin and collagen fibres.

Product.ProductName: Garnier Skin Naturals Nourishing Cold Cream
Product.ProductDescription:
Is Garnier Nourishing Cold Cream right for me?
Yes, if your skin is dry, uncomfortable and feels tight.Garnier Noursihing Cold Cream protects against harsh winter conditions and external aggressions like wind and pollution, which dry out skin and make it more fragile.

How is it different?
Garnier Nourishing Cold Cream is much more than a basic moisturiser: it works for 24 hours to nourish and protect skin against dryness. Rich formula, intensively moisturises to make skin soft and soothe any feeling of discomfort or tightness.

How does it work?
Its unique formula contains natural active ingredients such as 100% pure acacia honey, known for its hydro-fixating properties, to help maintain the skin's moisture level.

Results
Nourishes and protects the skin for 24 hours : 92%*
Prevents the skin from tightening: 95%*
Protects the skin from drying: 96%*
*Percentage of Indian women claiming effectiveness: tested on 102 women over 4 weeks.

Product.ProductDescription:
Is Garnier Wrinkle Lift Anti-ageing Cream right for me?
Yes, if you need an everyday complete solution that targets the different signs of ageing: wrinkles, fine lines, loss of firmness, skin dryness.
How is it different?
It does more than a classic anti-wrinkle cream: Garnier Wrinkle Lift Anti-ageing Cream has been designed to reduce wrinkles and put spring and vitality back into your skin, recovering lost firmness and elasticity.

Just Herbs Body Luster Sandal-Turmeric Ubtan Pack is our rendition of this traditional Indian skin ritual. This is a skin lightening and polishing body pack for use in place of soap to deep cleanse and nourish the facial and body skin. Effectively exfoliates, tones, texturises and refreshes the skin leaving it shimmering with renewed vitality and silky texture.

  • Contains certified organic Neem
  • 100% Natural. No added color, fragrance or preservatives

Product.ProductName: Olay Moisturising Cream Normal (Rs. 30 off)
Product.ProductDescription:
The Olay Story :

Olay is a product truly born from love, as it was created by a man as a gift for his wife. In the 1950s, chemist Graham Wulff saw his wife Dinah’s frustration with the thick, waxy beauty creams that left her skin looking greasy. Graham wanted to create a new beauty product for her that could not only moisturize her skin, but also leave her feeling beautiful and feminine.

Together, Graham and Dinah fine-tuned everything from absorption and texture to the instantly recognizable fragrance. At last, the legendary Oil of Olay Beauty Fluid was born.

Today, Olay is one of the most recognizable brands in the world and is the World’s No.1 selling facial skin care brand. Yet through all the changes and innovations, the philosophy upheld by Graham Wulff remains just as relevant as ever: Help women look and feel beautiful. That’s a potent formula for success.

The Olay Promise:

Olay is committed to providing safe products to our consumers. Ensuring the safety of our products is a responsibility that Olay takes very seriously. Each year, Olay conducts over 400,000 safety and quality tests to ensure an excellent experience for women around the world. For more information about the safety of Olay products and ingredients, please go to http://www.pgbeautygroomingscience.com/safety.html

Your skin is sure to look more radiant and luminous with Olay Moisturizing Cream that blends well and keeps skin healthy.

Long-lasting Moisturization : Get supple skin as this cream reduces dryness and provides long-lasting moisturization.

Reduces Fine Lines and Wrinkles : Get firmer skin texture with regular application of this cream that helps to reduce fine lines and wrinkles.

Soft and Smooth Skin : Enjoy younger looking skin with this cream from Olay that makes it soft and smooth.

Nourishment Up To 12 Hours : Providing 12 hours of nourishment, this cream keeps your skin hydrated.

Contains Fluids Similar To The Natural Fluids Of Your Skin : The composition of the cream is similar to the natural elements present in the skin and hence is both effective and safe.

Key Features :

  • This cream provides long lasting moisturisation and improves skin softness and smoothness to leave it youthful looking
  • Contains a special moisture binding system that locks in moisture where it’s needed most.
  • Contain fluids so similar to the natural fluids in young skin that skin readily claims them as its own.

Is Garnier Nourishing Cold Cream right for me?
Yes, if your skin is dry, uncomfortable and feels tight.Garnier Noursihing Cold Cream protects against harsh winter conditions and external aggressions like wind and pollution, which dry out skin and make it more fragile.

How is it different?
Garnier Nourishing Cold Cream is much more than a basic moisturiser: it works for 24 hours to nourish and protect skin against dryness. Rich formula, intensively moisturises to make skin soft and soothe any feeling of discomfort or tightness.

How does it work?
Its unique formula contains natural active ingredients such as 100% pure acacia honey, known for its hydro-fixating properties, to help maintain the skin's moisture level.

Results
Nourishes and protects the skin for 24 hours : 92%*
Prevents the skin from tightening: 95%*
Protects the skin from drying: 96%*

Product.ProductName: Olay Total Effects 7-In- 1 Day Cream Touch Of Foundation SPF15
Product.ProductDescription:
The Olay Story :

Olay is a product truly born from love, as it was created by a man as a gift for his wife. In the 1950s, chemist Graham Wulff saw his wife Dinah’s frustration with the thick, waxy beauty creams that left her skin looking greasy. Graham wanted to create a new beauty product for her that could not only moisturize her skin, but also leave her feeling beautiful and feminine.

Together, Graham and Dinah fine-tuned everything from absorption and texture to the instantly recognizable fragrance. At last, the legendary Oil of Olay Beauty Fluid was born.

Today, Olay is one of the most recognizable brands in the world and is the World’s No.1 selling facial skin care brand. Yet through all the changes and innovations, the philosophy upheld by Graham Wulff remains just as relevant as ever: Help women look and feel beautiful. That’s a potent formula for success.

The Olay Promise:

Olay is committed to providing safe products to our consumers. Ensuring the safety of our products is a responsibility that Olay takes very seriously. Each year, Olay conducts over 400,000 safety and quality tests to ensure an excellent experience for women around the world. For more information about the safety of Olay products and ingredients, please go to http://www.pgbeautygroomingscience.com/safety.html

Olay Total Effects helps fight the 7 signs of skin ageing to give you visibly younger looking skin. From cleansing to moisturising, it offers an array of products dedicated to making your skin look its best. Using an exclusive VitaNiacin formula.

Olay Total Effects moisturizers are proven effective in fighting the 7 signs of ageing :

  • Uneven Skin Tone: Balances and evens out skin tone
  • Dryness: Provides nourishing moisturization
  • Uneven Texture: Smoothens and evens out skin texture
  • Fine Lines & Wrinkles: Reducing the appearance of fine lines & wrinkles
  • Age Spots: Reduces the appearance of age spots
  • Dullness: Gives skin a healthy glow
  • Pores: Minimizes the appearance of pores

Key Features :

  • Helps fight the 7 signs of skin ageing to give you visibly younger looking skin
  • Has a touch of foundation to balance and give you an even skin tone
  • Provides nourishing skin moisturization to reduce skin dryness
  • Reduces dullness and gives your skin a healthy glow
  • Reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles

Chondroitin helps maintain the structural integrity of this tissue and promotes lubricating fluids for the joints. Lastly, MSM promotes joint and physical function by helping to maintain the elasticity of your joint tissue. With this triple support, your joints will have the opportunity for optimal flexibility, mobility and comfort.

Product.ProductName: Aroma Treasures Geranium Pure Essential Oil
Product.ProductDescription:
Physical Wellbeing : The Geranium oil contains diuretic properties, which means that it increases urination which is one of the three natural ways to remove toxins from the body. It promotes cell health by recycling the dead cells for the regeneration of new ones. Geranium’s strong properties prevent bacterial growth on wounds, thus keeping one safe from infections. Due to its uplifting aroma, comparable to a combination of floral fragrances and mint, it can also make up for an effective deodorant .

Beauty Applications : Everyone wants their skin to be free from scars and after marks of fat-cracks, surgeries, boils, acne or pox. Unfortunately, many people end up spending a fortune and trying all the available cosmetic solutions on the market and still don’t get the desired results. They could have avoided a waste of time and money had they tried Geranium Oil first. It is a powerful “cicatrisant”, and thus it helps the scars and other spots on the skin to fade and vanish. It facilitates blood circulation just below the surface of skin leading to a uniform distribution of melanin .

Emotional Wellbeing : The Geranium oil is comprised of components that helps in fighting against neuro-degenerative diseases like Alzheimer’s and dementia .

Key Features :

Essential oils are naturally extracted from plants to induce relaxation, increase energy and reduce stress. It seeks overall balance of mind, body and soul. Our essential oils are multipurpose in nature due to their antiseptic, antiviral and anti inflammatory qualities. Its healing properties assist in curing various disorders. Apart from its medicinal properties, it is also a great ingredient for emotional wellbeing, a definite anti depressant. Universally, these oils are also used for beautification .

Product.ProductName: Aroma Treasures Rose Absolute Pure Essential Oil
Product.ProductDescription:
Physical Wellbeing : Rose essential oil may calm down a patient of high fever by sedating the inflammation. is the most fragrant and luxurious way to treat wounds; imagine treating wounds with Oils of Rose instead of those ordinary antiseptic lotions. It anti - viral agent that behaves as a shield against any type of virus. Rose essential oil is one such shield, and studies have shown that it protects against many different types of viral infections .

Beauty Applications : Who doesn’t like to be pampered like the Goddess of beauty Cleopatra. This “cicstrisant” property of Rose Essential Oil can be of great interest for those who care a lot about their looks. It makes the scars and after marks of boils, acne and pox on the skin fade quickly. This includes the fading of stretch marks, surgery scars, and fat cracks associated with pregnancy and delivery. Much of this is due to the antioxidant activity of rose essential oil, which spurs on the healing processes of the skin .

Emotional Wellbeing : Rose being an ultimate woman’s oil is calming and supportive and has no parallel in treating grief, hysteria or depression. This oil is widely used in aromatherapy and invokes positive thoughts, spiritual relaxation and feelings of joy, happiness and hope. From Cupid himself to modern day’s high tech lovers, everyone knows how indispensable roses are in the romantic department .

Key Features :

Product.ProductName: Colorbar Timeless Filing and Lifting Foundation
Product.ProductDescription:

Additional Information: It is a dermatologically tested foundation hence it can be used on all skin types. It comes in a convenient pump shaped tube so the application process becomes easier and mess free.

  • Keeps the lips hydrated and moisturised for long.
  • Adds lustre to the lips and makes it plump.
  • The shine is long lasting.
  • The high content of moisturiser also heals dry and chapped lips.

Additional Information: Colorbar’s Perfect Pout Gloss comes in a long thick-walled glass tube with a doe foot applicator that makes it easy to apply. It covers the entire lip in a single stroke and reaches the corners of the mouth. It uniformly applies the gloss and you don’t need to go back into the tube for more product. So be ready to pout with Colorbar’s Perfect Pout Gloss with a bling!

  • This Salt is rich in minerals and softens skin while Sweet Balm extract supports purity and freshness. Moreover, this fine soap is enriched with highly nourishing Almond Oil that softens, protects and regenerates skin.
  • Abundant Salt and Sweet Balm lathers cleanse skin perfectly and leave it smooth, with a fresh aroma of unique spa ingredients. Experience a perfect Herbal and Salt Bath; a sheer treat for the skin. Since Salts conduct deep cleansing and detox, it is recommended to moisture your body post a bath. You may choose from our Spa Massage Oils to Body Butters and Lotions.

Product.ProductName: MaskerAide I Don't Wanna Grow Up Facial Sheet Mask
Product.ProductDescription: Go ahead, jump in the ‘Fountain of Youth’ and splash around! Who ever said you had to grow up anyway? Product.ProductName: MaskerAide Beauty Rest’ore Sheet Mask
Product.ProductDescription: Everyday your skin loses essential moisture and nutrients. Product.ProductName: Omved Restorative Shampoo
Product.ProductDescription:
Gentle plant-derived botanicals gently clean and soothe a flaky, itchy or dandruff-prone scalp

  • Anti-fungal Neem controls naturally occurring microbial levels that can cause scalp irritation.
  • Tea Tree nourishes a dry flaky scalp and relieves from itchiness and infection.
  • Brahmi, Ayurveda's hair tonic, prevents dandruff and promotes hair growth.
  • Aloe Vera and Vitamin E make hair soft and manageable. The beneficial extracts are blended in a base of gentle Ayurvedic herbs which are traditionally used for hair cleansing and conditioning like Arishtak (Soap nut) and Shikakai (fruit for the hair). Regular use will effectively cleanse and purify scalp, ease dryness and dandruff and add body, shine and bounce. Help hair grow beautiful, soft, silky and lustrous.

Almost everything you put on your hair gets on your scalp and what gets on your scalp can get absorbed into your body! Warm water and open pores during a hair wash make it imperative to use natural haircare products. Omved shampoos are the result of diligent manufacturing, sound traditional Ayurvedic wisdom and rare and effective premium quality botanicals, rich in vital hair nutrients and natural hair conditioning agents that take utmost care of your hair in a very gentle way.

They do not contain any harsh chemicals for foaming or conditioning and cleanse without stripping the outer protein layer of hair or drying the scalp. Protect your hair from harsh ingredients, synthetic additives and overpowering synthetic aromas.

We think you’ll love what it does for your hair.

Product.ProductName: Omved Hydrating Shampoo
Product.ProductDescription:

  • Geranium maintains the moisture balance of the scalp.
  • Aloe Vera and Vitamin E make hair soft and manageable.
  • Amalika nourishes with Vitamin C.
